data.title: Justin Siegel Net, Girlfriend, Married, Emmy Rossum Relationship
data.meta_description: Celebrities are popular for several reasons. Usually, most of the things about their lives are known to the public, even what they consider to be private
data.text:
Celebrities are popular for several reasons. Usually, most of the things about their lives are known to the public, even what they consider to be private and of a secret nature are often exposed to satisfy the curiosity of the masses.

But then, there are several individuals who achieved fame status but we don’t know much about them. Typically, most of these guys are described as “famous for being famous.” Essentially, they either gained fame for no particular identifiable reason, or gained celebrity status by associating with a celebrity.

While that’s true to some extent for Justin Siegel, that’s not the reason we don’t know much about him. He’s just overly secretive.

Justin Siegel Facts

We know that Justin Siegel will celebrate his 37th birthday in August 2018. He was born on the 25th day of the month in 1981 and grew up in the southernmost town of Florida, Palm Beach County – Boca Raton.

Also Read – Jesse Palmer Married, Wife, Gay, Girlfriend, Net Worth, Biography

We also know that Siegle is a music director and a co-founder of JNJ Mobile – an organization that operates a mobile community that allows users to make friends, stay in touch, play games and share the experience. . The organization founded in 2005 is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

Justin Siegal has a Masters in French Literature which he obtained in 1996 from the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. Previously, he had obtained a BA in sociology from this institution. It was in 1993. It is also known that he attended Berklee College of Music in Boston.

Before Siegal co-founded JNJ Mobile, he was a journalist. While affiliated with ABC News, he also worked as a television producer and editor for the NBC News Channel’s foreign desk.

Beyond JNJ Mobile, co-founded by Justin Siegelen 2005, of which he is the President and CEO, he is also the founder and managing partner of ATX Angel, LLC. In addition, he has been a partner at Capital Factory since September 2014.

Mr. Siegel’s Bloomberg profile has linked him to numerous establishments. Although it was specified that he has a background in mobile entertainment, it was revealed that he was once Vice President of SkyZone. Entertainment and detailed that he led SkyZone’s product strategy and oversaw the production and development of its products including Duke Nukem Mobile 3D, Brine Lacrosse, The Crocodile Hunter: Operation Rescue, Encyclopedia Britannica and Donovan McNabb Street Action.

Prior to his accomplishments with SkyZone, he was the CEO and co-founder of JSmart Technologies. It is said that he will always be recognized for developing and managing important relationships with major wireless and entertainment industries at JSmart. Some of the companies he has worked with include Sony Ericsson, AT&T Wireless, Nokia, Verizon Wireless, etc.

In addition to the above, Siegal is a TechStars Mentor. Likewise, he is an advisor to Boston Seed Capital. The musical executive is often described as an entrepreneur and an investor.

Net worth of Justin Siegel

Although one can find different numbers quoted as an estimate of Justin Siegel’s net worth, none of these estimates can be substantiated as they are all guesswork.

It is easy to see that Siegel’s net worth is $10 million, but it has also been said that the value of his wealth is less than that. The value of Justin Siegel’s wealth is best known to him.

Justin Siegel girlfriend, married

Siegel was previously married to an American actress and songwriter, Emmy Rossum. He secretly married her in 2008 and the marriage crashed in 2010.

Justin hasn’t been romantically linked to anyone since splitting from Emmy. It was generally assumed that he had no girlfriend and was unmarried. But then, no one can really say. He was married to Emmy and no one knew about it until the marriage collapsed.

See Also – Jessica Parker Kennedy Family, Height, Body Net Worth, Married

Justin Siegel Relationship with Emmy Rossum

Siegal married Emmy Rossum on February 17, 2008. However, they tricked the public into thinking they were just lovers in a relationship.

So, it was a big shock when it emerged that Siegel is set to divorce Emmy. He formally filed for dissolution of the marriage due to irreconcilable differences on September 25, 2009. After filing for divorce, he filed for alimony. The request was denied when the divorce was finalized on December 28, 2010.
